name: Neo-Fureza: The Bonds Of Fate.
description:
Lance aka Delta-Kay's second major game project made in RPG Maker XP, based on the Neo-Fureza Graphic Novels and Artwork. It follows the events after the Aeonian Wars with Delta Kamiji, the former and fallen king of the destroyed Delcaro Kingdom, going on an adventure that leads him through various places and battles in Aeonia-Earth and the country of Neo-Fureza, as well as repairing bonds with old friends and defeating old enemies. It’s currently a light-hearted Visual Novel RPG Hybrid RPG Maker XP game with assets created in Adobe Flash CS4 2004. Neo-Engine Demo Build Preview has been completed as of January 2023.

As of March 2023, Act 1 of the game's story scenario is completed as well as some Easter Egg  stuff and the Vs. The Super Boss Battle currently.

Suggestions and Constructive Criticism one what I need to Improve are welcomed.\

Updated: April, 16th, 2023: The Game comes with the complete full story of the Neo-Fureza Comic Series, so far. Added for the masses to get into the Lore and the Story before playing the game.

Also, donate if you want to. It is not required.  I appreciate you if you did however. :3

Been hard at work on these for 6 to 7 Years off and on. (I have other projects I am all doing on my own). Hope you enjoy the lighthearted, silly games I made. ^w^

~Delta
